PitchIdea.title: PitchIdea
PitchIdea.description: Represents a startup idea submitted by a user, including the generated content.

id.description: Unique identifier for the PitchIdea entity.

userId.description: Reference to the User who submitted the idea.

ideaDescription.description: The user's description of their startup idea.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the idea was submitted.

GeneratedPitch.title: GeneratedPitch
GeneratedPitch.description: Represents the AI-generated pitch details for a startup idea.

id.description: Unique identifier for the GeneratedPitch entity.

pitchIdeaId.description: Reference to the PitchIdea this pitch was generated for.

tagline.description: The AI-generated tagline for the startup.

targetAudience.description: The AI-generated description of the target audience.

heroSectionCopy.description: The AI-generated hero section copy for the startup's website.

DesignSuggestion.title: DesignSuggestion
DesignSuggestion.description: Represents the AI-generated design suggestions (color palette and logo concepts) for a startup.

id.description: Unique identifier for the DesignSuggestion entity.

generatedPitchId.description: Reference to the GeneratedPitch this design suggestion belongs to.

colorPalette.description: An array of suggested colors for the startup's brand.

logoConcepts.description: An array of descriptions or references to suggested logo concepts.

User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity.

'/users/{userId}'.description: Stores user profiles. Access is restricted to the user themselves.

'/users/{userId}/pitchIdeas/{pitchIdeaId.description: Stores pitch ideas submitted by a specific user. Utilizes path-based ownership for simplified security rules.
